work.title: Automation Developer
work.desc: Designed software solutions using Python, VBA, and RPA for various teams to automate tasks. Researched different approaches based on teams' needs and available resources. Implemented 8 projects saving a total of 15.5 hours of manual work per month.

work.title: Financial Analyst
work.desc: Developed software tools using Python, VBA, and Dataverse to analyze financial documents. Performed data collection and task monitoring to better understand the flow of information. Implemented systems to automate 5 processes, saving a total of 8 hours per month.

work.title: Research Assistant
work.desc: Assisted with research for medical papers on Scleroderma and Sjogren's syndrome. Performed data collection of patients, medical documents, and lab results. Analyzed and consolidated infromation using software tools.

other.title: Data Science Intern
other.desc: Developed Artificial Intelligence solutions for various businesses in the Kingston community. Conducted research to find the best approach based on client needs and available resources.

other.title: Education Coordinator
other.desc: Designed educational material about Artificial Intelligence to engage others. Researched various topics and engaged with the QMIND community to better understand impact. Collaborated with team to develop a course about Artificial Intelligence to be offered by Queen's University.

other.title: Design Member
other.desc: Built an Artificial Intelligence for classifying cancer in CT scans of lungs. Studied medical imaging data and developed a convolutional neural network. The model classifies results with 83% accuracy.
